title: A structure shall mean all the dwelling areas of all persons who are enumerated as living in one numbered house in the electoral roll of the latest date, upto 1st January 2000 or such other reference date Notified by the Govt
clause_text: A structure shall mean all the dwelling areas of all persons who are enumerated as living in one numbered house in the electoral roll of the latest date, upto 1st January 2000 or such other reference date Notified by the Govt. and regardless of the number of persons, or location of rooms or access.

source_pdf.text_snippet: A structure shall mean all the dwelling areas of all persons who are enumerated as living in one numbered house in the electoral roll of the latest date, upto 1st January 2000 or such other reference
